basics.name: Alexander Figueroa
basics.label: Software And Developer
basics.summary: I am a web developer that specializes in eCommerce development. Thanks to the hard work and dedication of the open source community, I have had the opportunity to hack on dozens of eCommerce platforms. I love helping entrepreneurs and pairing with other developers.

references.reference: I have worked with Alexander on several different occasions in different positions he has held. When it came time to redesign my website, he was the first person i. I outlined what I had in mind, and what I needed. He came up with several options within my guidelines and presented them to me. What I ended up with surpassed my original idea and has won me praise from my clients on how wonderful my website is.
references.name: Gökhan Şengün

references.reference: I am known Alexander for a unique qualities and Alexander is one of those. He is not only a wise and an eager developer, but also an inspiring manager. Alexander an amazing team player who can take a concept from initiation to completion. Will be willing to work with him again.
